Statement: DEL-01-04 implements scope item SOW-0009: Obtain/manage/pay for required permits inspections approvals and directed re-work/re-inspections
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition scope ledger: SOW-0009 maps to DEL-01-04 under PKG-001.

Statement: DEL-01-04 traces to OBJ-008: Execute a safe controlled Design-Build delivery including permitting/inspections
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition objectives table: OBJ-008 supported by DEL-01-04.

Statement: DEL-01-04 traces to OBJ-005: Deliver complete site/civil works enabling operations including utilities
EvidenceQuote: Objective Support: OBJ-005 (ASSUMPTION: best-effort package heuristic)
Notes: ASSUMPTION. Datasheet notes best-effort package heuristic mapping. Confirmed in decomposition scope ledger for SOW-0009.

Statement: Baseline Gantt schedule must be available to align inspection hold-points with construction milestones
EvidenceQuote: Project Schedule (DEL-01-02): Baseline Gantt schedule must be available to align inspection hold-points
Notes: FACT. Procedure explicitly lists DEL-01-02 as a prerequisite for inspection plan development.

Statement: Conceptual design must be sufficiently advanced to identify applicable building systems and permit categories
EvidenceQuote: Design Brief (DEL-01-01): Conceptual design must be sufficiently advanced to identify applicable building systems
Notes: FACT. Procedure explicitly lists DEL-01-01 as a prerequisite for permit category identification.

Statement: Alberta Building Code (current edition) required to verify design compliance prior to permit submission
EvidenceQuote: Alberta Building Code (current edition): Required to verify design compliance prior to permit submission
Notes: FACT. Procedure explicitly lists Alberta Building Code as a prerequisite. Clause-level requirements TBD (document not accessible).

Statement: Inspection findings from DEL-01-04 (AHJ/code) and DEL-01-03 (OHS) must be cross-referenced where they affect each other
EvidenceQuote: DB should ensure inspection findings from either regime are cross-referenced where they affect the other
Notes: FACT. Guidance explicitly describes boundary and bidirectional cross-reference of inspection findings between DEL-01-04 and DEL-01-03.

Statement: Utility connection coordination requires interface with DEL-03-04 for service tie-in design and utility provider approvals
EvidenceQuote: Engage Utility Provider(s) to coordinate all service and utility connections to the building
Notes: FACT. Procedure Step B6 and Specification REQ-01-04-03 explicitly require utility connection coordination. SOW-0110 cash allowance treatment means DEL-03-04 manages allowance; DEL-01-04 manages permits/approvals for utility connections.

Statement: Occupancy permit and SP conformance letters produced by DEL-01-04 are required inputs for Substantial Performance package managed by DEL-01-07
SourceRef: Procedure.md > Steps > Step B7 and Step B8
EvidenceQuote: Obtain the occupancy permit from the AHJ ... Submit occupancy permit as part of the Substantial Performance package
Notes: FACT. Procedure Steps B7/B8 explicitly produce occupancy permit and SP conformance letters that feed into DEL-01-07 (SOW-0015) Substantial Performance deliverables.

TargetName: Environmental Constraints Flood Hazard & Regulatory Compliance
Statement: AEP environmental approval determination depends on flood/water constraint analysis from DEL-03-05; if AEP approval required it must be tracked in permit matrix
EvidenceQuote: Environmental approvals (AEP) -- if required for flood/water constraints ... storm retention pond and areas in the flood fringe
Notes: FACT. Guidance explicitly states AEP approval trigger depends on whether construction falls within AEP-regulated areas (floodway/flood fringe). DEL-03-05 covers environmental/flood hazard compliance. TBD whether AEP approval is required (Lensing item C-001).
